name: Die and Dices
description:
TUTORIAL

________________________________________________________________________________

Dive into this theatrical world where you must fight till the very end for your final (or is it ?) reward! Get into the scene from the menu to start playing and roll those dices when it's your turn by tapping on ANY DICES!

Then keep the dice you want, amount (number) or type (symbol) just by clicking on the dice you want to reroll:

The red dice means dealing damage, the green one heals, the white one DOUBLE your damage, and the Black one is just to dodge at all cost...

Be wary of what you choose to keep and how you play it because you may one-shot the 3rd wave in front of you with one lucky hit, but the ennemy could also get a lucky roll and make your favorite little character ( maybe The great mage of Janitor) go to oblivion never to be seen again for the rest of the run.

Have fun and don't hesitate to tag us ! 

________________________________________________________________________________

This jam inspired us to make a complete game, this is the prototype of that game.

In this game, you'll be a Play director with his troops that'll fight on scene.

Each of those troops has a Dice which defines its Play Skill, which you'll be able to upgrade in the future.

In this prototype, every dice have the same skills 

- 3 Attack Faces 

- 1 Heal Face -

- 1 Luck Face (Not Editable) 

- 1 Bad Luck Face (Not editable) 

In each turn, you'll roll two dice: your skill dice and a d6. 

You'll also be able to cheat by re-rolling one dice, but do not abuse it, it may be dangerous in a future update
